patthana7.1:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—akusalaṁ abyākataṁ
patthana7.1:2.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca akusalā abyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana7.1:2.1_2: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana7.1:2.1_3: naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo
patthana7.1:2.1_4: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā
patthana7.1:2.1_5: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā
patthana7.1:3.1_0: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana7.1:3.1_1: paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
patthana7.1:3.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato
patthana7.1:3.1_3: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo
patthana7.1:4.1_0: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ
patthana7.1:4.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana7.1:4.1_2: naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato
patthana7.1:4.1_3: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato
patthana7.1:4.1_4: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo
patthana7.1:5.1_0: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:5.1_1: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:5.1_2: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:5.1_3: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana7.1:5.1_4: hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā
patthana7.1:6.1_0: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:6.1_1: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:6.1_2: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:6.1_3: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana7.1:6.1_4: hetupaccayā. Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca
patthana7.1:7.1_0: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
patthana7.1:7.1_1: naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
patthana7.1:7.1_2: naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana7.1:8.1: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana7.1:9.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana7.1:11.1_0: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo …pe…. Nakusalo dhammo
patthana7.1:11.1_1: nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa
patthana7.1:11.1_2: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana7.1:11.1_3: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana7.1:11.1_4: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana7.1:11.1_5: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:12.1: Naakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:13.1: Naabyākato dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:14.1: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:15.1: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:16.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:17.1_0: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … anantarapaccayena
patthana7.1:17.1_1: paccayo … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena
patthana7.1:17.1_2: paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena
patthana7.1:17.1_3: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe… nakusalo
patthana7.1:17.1_4: dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:18.1_0: Naakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Naakusalo dhammo
patthana7.1:18.1_1: nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe… naakusalo dhammo nakusalassa
patthana7.1:18.1_2: ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:19.1_0: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:19.1_1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo
patthana7.1:19.1_2: …pe… nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena
patthana7.1:20.1_0: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chattiṁsa, adhipatiyā pañcatiṁsa, anantare catuttiṁsa,
patthana7.1:20.1_1: samanantare catuttiṁsa, sahajāte ekūnatiṁsa, aññamaññe catuvīsa, nissaye catuttiṁsa,
patthana7.1:20.1_2: upanissaye chattiṁsa, purejāte aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte aṭṭhārasa, āsevane catuvīsa,
patthana7.1:20.1_3: kamme ekūnatiṁsa, vipāke nava, āhāre ekūnatiṁsa …pe… sampayutte catuvīsa, vippayutte
patthana7.1:21.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
